title: Cruel Kings
description: My brothers and I are the cruel, merciless elites who rule the campus of Silverlake University.Our bond is strong. Unshakeable. And we don’t take any prisoners.Women never came between us until the day she stepped into our lives.Camilla Brown.Her innocence draws us in and we become obsessed, but it’s not long before our obsession turns dark.She’s dared to enter our home with her mother and lay claim to what’s ours.She pretends to be innocent and naive, but she's a player like her mother, who’s ensnared our father.They’re both here to covet what belongs to us.She’s seen our good side but it’s time to show her the devils we truly are.By destroying her.There’s just one problem.The more we try to break her, the weaker we become.Sink your teeth into this sinfully delicious reverse harem stepbrother romance series today! This story contains dark themes such as bullying, abuse and violence, so please heed the note at the beginning of the introduction.
author: Ivy Clyde
